duties_responsibilities.duty: Hands-on design, implementation, configuration, integration, and deployment experience with SailPoint.
Application Onboarding like Custom delimited connector Oracle Database – Direct Workday LDAP JDBC Active Directory Azure Active Directory Salesforce Oracle E-Business.
Design and implementation of SailPoint IIQ custom connectors.
Knowledge of UI customization and Creation of Custom forms.
Web Services (both Soap Based as well as Restful).
Custom plugin reconciliation tasks using Java APIs.
Experience in any other IDM suite (Oracle) is an added advantage.
Total of 5+ years of IT Experience in SailPoint IIQ.
Experience in large scale end-to-end implementation (design development deployment).
